data.text: @AmlikaQ Haha it’s fine. I was all fluffed out anyway. sometimes angst is enough to set you in edge. Though this amount has canceled out the fluff. So I’m neutral?
@Katrina_Meade Yesss. Well this is the exact kind of angst that nobody needs at this hour lol. Sorry and goodnite 😅

@Katrina_Meade Oh man I can finally use the fic title Indelible lol. Tae can no longer leave a mark behind but feelings are indelible, like phantom ink stains on a hand, they linger long after the person ceases to exist.
@AmlikaQ Such a sadness that would overcome Tae. No longer able to leave his mark as he loses control.

@Katrina_Meade the same way I see tae sliding his hand across jk at night as jk sleeps, trying in vain to grab onto him yet watches as his fingers leave a trail of blurry delayed motions behind, no longer able to leave a mark in this world.
@AmlikaQ No I haven’t had the chance to watch it yet. I want to though. I remember seeing the original with my dad.

@Katrina_Meade Have u ever watched blade runner the new one? There’s a scene of gosling making love to this girl possessed by an AI. The silhouette of the AI looms around the physical profile of the real girl, like frames of delayed motion. It’s achingly beautiful,
@AmlikaQ ...ahdhgsnaksnzysg. This needs to happen like yesterday.

@Katrina_Meade ... the warmth of jks skin suddenly inaccessible. 

Where would he go if he’s stuck between the two worlds, what would he be then? And who would watch over jk
@AmlikaQ Oh my...yes. Fearful Tae. Afraid of what he would become in the times of his lapsed control. Uncertain if he will ever regain control.

@Katrina_Meade Yeah. Imagine tae having always had shapeshifting abilities, but slowly he’s losing control, and he begins to stay at home more, scared of the moment when his figure glitches and the two shadows drift in and out of eo. He hates the feeling, fingers no longer material,

@AmlikaQ Hmmm yeah. That is a good way to also think about shapeshifting. Like with all fantasy elements everything is open to interpretation. Whether it is animal shifting, having the ability to shape yourself into various people, or even shape shifting into objects.

@AmlikaQ I have always wanted to do shapeshifters but when I wanted to they were like super popular so I never did. The closest I’ve come is my werewolves. Because the were genre is shapeshifters pretty much. Because most people utilize The shapeshifter form of werewolves.
@Katrina_Meade I’ve only written hybrids before, not shapeshifter 🤔
@AmlikaQ Haha I just saw that now...
